An alien invasion wipes out the music population worldwide, leaving the planet silent.
A group of rebels work together to overthrow a government that has outlawed music.
The music industry collapses after a string of tragic accidents involving music producers and performers.
A natural disaster destroys the entire city's music collection, leaving the people bereft.
A group of artists band together to create a new sound and revive the art of music after the sudden loss of all known songs.
